[[File:Minecraft Swarovski figurines.jpeg|thumb|All four figurines.]]
'''{{w|Swarovski}}''' is a producer of jewelry, watches and crystal decorations that collaborated with [[Mojang Studios]] on a ''[[Minecraft]]''-themed collection. The collection was revealed in May 2025 at the {{w|MCM Comic Con London}}<ref>{{Cite TikTok|dailymailgaming|7507582456023846167|These crystal Minecraft sets look insane! ðŸ”¥ #minecraft #gaming #swarovski #mojang #xbox #pcgaming|May 23, 2025}}</ref> and released in June 2025.

== Character Creator item ==
[[File:Minecraft Swarovski Crystal Suit.jpeg|thumb|A player wearing the Crystal Suit {{in|BE}}.]]

Upon the purchase of any of the four figurines, the player receives a [[Character Creator]] item.<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-x-swarovski|Minecraft x Swarovski|July 17, 2025|Cristina Anderca}}</ref>
